description:
Search Engine Optimization (SEO) is an art and lifelong process to make your website shine against all odds on the mighty search engine giants like Google, Yahoo, Bing, Yandex, etc. SEO involves a lot of strategies, both on-page and off-page and this course designed to explain each and every strategy practiced by SEO professionals in detail.

Are you new to the world of SEO? Are you a Blogger? Do you already have a business? Have you decided to Bootstrap your own Startup? Do you want your website to make an International Impact or you want your website to be the #1 local brand? If you fall into any of these categories, then this course is crafted to suit all kinds of SEO needs and audience.

Why Hire anyone to make your website SEO Friendly when you can buckle up and do it yourself? Businesses, Startups, Newbies and Bloggers can highly benefit from this Complete All-In-One SEO course.

This course contains all the latest SEO Tactics from the very beginning the word 'SEO' was invented till 2015 and will be updated lifelong as and when new SEO Terms come into existence.

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★

Main Highlights of "Beginner/Advanced SEO Course for Startups, Businesses and Bloggers":

  • A-Z List of Complete SEO Terms to get started.
  • How to Rank your Website #1 in Google, Yahoo, Bing, Yandex, etc.
  • How to Rank High in Image Search Results?
  • Local SEO to Rank #1 in local search results
  • International SEO to make an International Impact
  • Mobile SEO to make your Mobile Responsive website SEO Friendly.
  • Actionable Insights into Google's 200 Website Ranking Factors
  • Secret Backlink Building Srategies only SEO Experts know
  • Learning Black Hat SEO Tactics to avoid them.
  • Understanding Moz Metrics in detail
  • Rich Snippets, Structured Data and Schema(.)org
  • Using Google Webmaster, Analytics and Keyword Planner like a Pro.
  • Knowledge Graph Optimization: The Future of SEO
  • Getting featured in Google's Quick Answer Box

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★

This SEO course is designed for Beginners and Advanced users. Beginners can jumpstart their SEO journey and Advanced SEO users can further enhance their skills with the latest inclusions in the SEO industry.

Beginner to Advanced SEO Course will make you an SEO expert in 15 days. If you have a go-getter attitude and a will to master SEO, you can become an SEO Samurai in a fortnight.

This course begins with an introduction to useful SEO Terms, then helps newbies setting up their website, followed by a dive in the vast ocean of SEO and ends up making you an SEO Rockstar.
title: Beginner-Advanced SEO Course for Startup, Business, Bloggers
